oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Veteran’s Administration Hospital laying of the cornerstone, Nashville, Tennessee, 1961 June 19
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The official ceremony for the laying of the cornerstone of the Veteran’s Administration Hospital, at Vanderbilt campus, Twenty-fourth Avenue S and Garland. The ceremony was presented by Mayor Ben West, as well as other dignitaries and supporters, with a brass band on June 19th, 1961. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 6 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
